item.title: IdeaVault - RPi dashboard
item.description: I couldn’t help myself after listening to John & Marco discussion about the pricing of Panic’s new app Status Board.

item.title: Project Plan and Gantter.com
item.description: Project planning is always a difficult task for me. I could do anything to skip the project planning because for following reasons:

item.title: Prj - Times of India epub
item.description: Remember my old post about the TOI - Epub project? Yesterday, I published the source on github. If anyone still interested, go ahead and take a look at the source.

item.title: Idea Vault: Prj - Dug Me
item.description: Task management app with little twist. Yep, Dug instead of clippy while nagging. Idea is to log all our project ideas similar to logging notes in nvALT.

item.title: Idea Vault: Tree view
item.description: A Bookmarklet or a Browser extension to select the root element of a DOM (UL/OL) to view the Inverted tree structure of its child nodes.
